Articles.Content:
Hello, 

i am learning to use Unity3d, and one of the things i wouldn't know how to do in KSP is to display the patchedConics, especially when they are rescaled and reformed so quickly. I bet they are not mesh renderers, but what are they? I hope you don't consider this to be undisclosable because i would really like to know and is driving me crazy...

 

thank you

 

Edit: sorry just realised there are line renderers...

Edited June 16, 2016 by NeuralMe
This is a bad question, yo ucan just remove it. i could not find the button to do it myself
